languages.text: "Каждый житель Империума рождается с предначертанной судьбой. Солдат, простолюдин, чиновник {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Администратума{/g}, техномат и пустотная крыса — всем им на роду написано служить, а затем умереть во славу {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотого Трона{/g} мрачной смертью. Империум привык помыкать и расточать людей небрежно, ведь никакой ресурс не возобновляется столь же просто".

traits.locale_text: "Каждый житель Империума рождается с предначертанной судьбой. Солдат, простолюдин, чиновник {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Администратума{/g}, техномат и пустотная крыса — всем им на роду написано служить, а затем умереть во славу {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотого Трона{/g} мрачной смертью. Империум привык помыкать и расточать людей небрежно, ведь никакой ресурс не возобновляется столь же просто".

languages.text: "Everyone born in the Imperium has a predestination. The soldier, the commoner, the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} official, the technomat, the void rat — all are consigned to serving the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} and then dying a grim death for its glory. The Imperium never thinks twice about treating people as exploitable and expendable. After all, they are the most easily replenished of all resources."

Империум привык помыкать и расточать людей небрежно, ведь никакой ресурс не возобновляется столь же просто".

The Imperium never thinks twice about treating people as exploitable and expendable. After all, they are the most easily replenished of all resources."

languages.text: "Jeder, der im Imperium geboren wird, hat eine Vorbestimmung. Der Soldat, der Bürger, der Beamte des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}, der Technomat, die Leerenratte — alle sind dazu verdammt, dem {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Goldenen Thron{/g} zu dienen und dann zu dessen Ruhm einen düsteren Tod zu sterben. Das Imperium behandelt Menschen als ausbeutbar und ersetzbar, gnadenlos. Schließlich sind sie die am leichtesten wiederaufzufüllende Ressource."
languages.original_text: "Everyone born in the Imperium has a predestination. The soldier, the commoner, the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} official, the technomat, the void rat — all are consigned to serving the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} and then dying a grim death for its glory. The Imperium never thinks twice about treating people as exploitable and expendable. After all, they are the most easily replenished of all resources."

traits.locale_text: "Jeder, der im Imperium geboren wird, hat eine Vorbestimmung. Der Soldat, der Bürger, der Beamte des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}, der Technomat, die Leerenratte — alle sind dazu verdammt, dem {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Goldenen Thron{/g} zu dienen und dann zu dessen Ruhm einen düsteren Tod zu sterben. Das Imperium behandelt Menschen als ausbeutbar und ersetzbar, gnadenlos. Schließlich sind sie die am leichtesten wiederaufzufüllende Ressource."

languages.text: « Tous ceux nés dans l'Imperium sont prédestinés : soldats, populace, officiels de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}, technomates, rats du cosmos... Tous sont au service du {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône d'Or{/g}, le temps de mourir atrocement pour sa seule gloire... L'Imperium n'hésite jamais à se servir de sa population, ni même à la sacrifier. Après tout, elle est la ressource qui se réapprovisionne le plus facilement. »
languages.original_text: "Everyone born in the Imperium has a predestination. The soldier, the commoner, the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} official, the technomat, the void rat — all are consigned to serving the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} and then dying a grim death for its glory. The Imperium never thinks twice about treating people as exploitable and expendable. After all, they are the most easily replenished of all resources."

traits.locale_text: « Tous ceux nés dans l'Imperium sont prédestinés : soldats, populace, officiels de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}, technomates, rats du cosmos... L'Imperium n'hésite jamais à se servir de sa population, ni même à la sacrifier. Après tout, elle est la ressource qui se réapprovisionne le plus facilement. »

languages.text: “每位帝国臣民生来就有被注定的宿命。士兵、平民、{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}内政部官员{/g}、技工，甚至那些卑微的虚空老鼠……所有人都注定要为{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}服务，为它的荣耀而死。帝国将人们视为随时可以丢弃的消耗品，牺牲人命的时候没有丝毫犹豫。毕竟，在所有的资源之中，人是最容易补充的。”
languages.original_text: "Everyone born in the Imperium has a predestination. The soldier, the commoner, the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} official, the technomat, the void rat — all are consigned to serving the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} and then dying a grim death for its glory. The Imperium never thinks twice about treating people as exploitable and expendable. After all, they are the most easily replenished of all resources."

traits.locale_text: “每位帝国臣民生来就有被注定的宿命。士兵、平民、{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}内政部官员{/g}、技工，甚至那些卑微的虚空老鼠……所有人都注定要为{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}服务，为它的荣耀而死。帝国将人们视为随时可以丢弃的消耗品，牺牲人命的时候没有丝毫犹豫。毕竟，在所有的资源之中，人是最容易补充的。”

languages.text: 「帝国に生まれた者は皆、宿命を背負っている。兵士、一般市民、{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}行政局員{/g}、テクノマット、虚空のネズミ…誰もが{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金の玉座{/g}に仕えて、その後はその栄光のために悲惨な死を遂げることが使命だ。帝国は人々を搾取可能な消耗品扱いすることを決して改めない。なんと言っても、どんな資源よりも一番簡単に補充できるからな」
languages.original_text: "Everyone born in the Imperium has a predestination. The soldier, the commoner, the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} official, the technomat, the void rat — all are consigned to serving the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} and then dying a grim death for its glory. The Imperium never thinks twice about treating people as exploitable and expendable. After all, they are the most easily replenished of all resources."

traits.locale_text: 「帝国に生まれた者は皆、宿命を背負っている。兵士、一般市民、{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}行政局員{/g}、テクノマット、虚空のネズミ…誰もが{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金の玉座{/g}に仕えて、その後はその栄光のために悲惨な死を遂げることが使命だ。帝国は人々を搾取できる消耗品扱いすることを絶対に改めない。なんと言っても、どんな資源よりも一番簡単に補充できるからな」

languages.text: «Todos los nacidos en el Imperium tienen una predeterminación. El soldado, el plebeyo, el funcionario del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}, el tecnómata, la rata del vacío... todos están destinados a servir al {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono Dorado{/g} y a morir por su gloria. El Imperium no se lo piensa dos veces a la hora de tratar a las personas como explotables y prescindibles. Al fin y al cabo, son los recursos más fáciles de reponer».
languages.original_text: "Everyone born in the Imperium has a predestination. The soldier, the commoner, the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} official, the technomat, the void rat — all are consigned to serving the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} and then dying a grim death for its glory. The Imperium never thinks twice about treating people as exploitable and expendable. After all, they are the most easily replenished of all resources."

traits.locale_text: «Todos los nacidos en el Imperium tienen una predeterminación. El soldado, el plebeyo, el funcionario del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}, el tecnómata, la rata del vacío... todos están destinados a servir al {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono Dorado{/g} y a morir por su gloria. El Imperium no se lo piensa dos veces a la hora de tratar a las personas como explotables y prescindibles. Al fin y al cabo, son los recursos más fáciles de reponer».

languages.text: "İmparatorluk'ta herkes yazgısıyla doğar: Asker, sivil, {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} subayı, teknomat, uçsuz sıçanı... Yazgı fark etmeksizin herkes, {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Altın Taht'a{/g} hizmet etmeye biat etmiştir ve Taht namına ölmeye mahkûmdur. İmparatorluk, insanları kullanıp atmaktan geri durmaz. Ne de olsa insan, en kolay yenilenen kaynaktır."
languages.original_text: "Everyone born in the Imperium has a predestination. The soldier, the commoner, the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} official, the technomat, the void rat — all are consigned to serving the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} and then dying a grim death for its glory. The Imperium never thinks twice about treating people as exploitable and expendable. After all, they are the most easily replenished of all resources."

traits.locale_text: "İmparatorluk'ta herkes yazgısıyla doğar: Asker, sivil, {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} subayı, teknomaton, uçsuz sıçanı... Yazgı fark etmeksizin herkes, {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Altın Taht{/g}'a hizmet etmeye biat etmiştir ve Taht namına ölmeye mahkûmdur. İmparatorluk, insanları kullanıp atmaktan geri durmaz. Ne de olsa insan, en kolay yenilenen kaynaktır."
